data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Alta Verapaz, Guatemala to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alta Verapaz, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 546,001 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Alta Verapaz to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Alta Verapaz.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Alta Verapaz, Guatemala, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Alta Verapaz who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Alta Verapaz to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
